verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the glory of the Lord
Rise among us
Let the glory of the Lord
Rise among us
Let the praises of the King
Rise among us
Let it rise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let the songs of the Lord
Rise among us
Let the songs of the Lord
Rise among us
Let the joy of the King
Rise among us let it rise

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O let it rise
O let it rise
